label: AB3C_oP20_62_c_3c_c-001
title: (NH$_{4}$)CdCl$_{3}$ ($E2_{4}$) Structure
comments:
(Brasseur, 1938) gave the Wyckoff positions in the $Pnam$ setting of space group \#62.  We used FINDSYM to rotate the structure and put it in the standard $Pnma$ setting. 
 The ICSD lists \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_oP20_62_c_3c_c-001}{(NH$_{4}$)CdCl$_{3}$ ($E2_{4}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-003}{ottemannite (Sn$_{2}$S$_{3}$} under the structure type NH4CdCl3\#Sn2S3, but we prefer to use different prototypes for the binary and tenary structures. 
 This structure has the same AFLOW label as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_oP20_62_c_3c_c-002}{CuTaS$_{3}$}, AB3C\_oP20\_62\_c\_3c\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
